sentences.sentence: They all greeted me very cordially and were eager to talk about the new project.
sentences.translation: 他们非常友善地和我打招呼，很想谈谈新项目。

sentences.sentence: You are cordially invited to a celebration for Mr Michael Brown on his retirement.
sentences.translation: 热诚邀请您参加为迈克尔•布朗先生退休举行的庆祝会。
他们对对方都深恶痛绝。
